job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} starver .DEV2 echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' if (! $?) then set evtsFile = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set r1 = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` set r2 = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $4}'` set i1 = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $5}'` set i2 = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $6}'` set j1 = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $7}'` set j2 = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $8}'` else set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set r1 = 1 set r2 =-1 set i1 = 1 set i2 =-1 set j1 = 1 set j2 =-1 endif echo "root.exe -q -b ${evtsFile} 'doFractionFit.C('${r1}','${r2}','${i1}','${i2}','${j1}','${j2}',1,0,0)'" root.exe -q -b ${evtsFile} 'doFractionFit.C('${r1}','${r2}','${i1}','${i2}','${j1}','${j2}',1,0,0)' >& ${JOBID}B.log
